subject: Re: Paris Air Show - Young NAG Activities on the 18th of June!
email_chain:
Zarnowska, Agata (NLD)
23 Apr 2025, 17:16 (4 days ago)
to young@nag.aero

Dear Young NAG Ambassadors,

 

We’re excited to invite you to the Paris Air Show 2025! To encourage companies to send their Young Professionals to this prestigious event, Young NAG is organizing side events exclusively for Young NAG members. You’ll get access to selected chalets and booths, and Ambassadors will receive free entrance tickets.

 

Spots are limited and assigned on a first come, first serve basis. Make sure to sign up!

 

Date: 18th of June 2025 (Wed)

Time: 13:00 - 17:00

Location: Netherlands Aerospace Group stand at Paris le Bourget

Programme:

Optional programme – 17th of June (Tue)

19:00-22:00 - Young NAG Dinner in Paris (self-paying participation)

Main programme

13:00-13:30 - Speaker - Lodewijk Asscher
13:30-15:00 - Tour to chalets and stands - Embraer confirmed, awaiting feedback from other selected companies by Ambassadors: Airbus, ZeroAvia, Lockheed, Clean Aviation, Safran, and Dassault Systemes)
15:00-15:30 - Panel Discussion - about aviation meeting 2050 NetZero goals
15:30-17:00 - Drinks hosted at the Dutch stand
18:00-21:00 - NAG Dinner (optional, self-paying participation)

  

Costs:

Unfortunately, Young NAG cannot fully cover participation costs. Our role here is to create an agenda which will encourage your company to invest in your personal development and support your participation.

Costs covered by Young NAG:
Entrance tickets
Drinks
Costs not covered by Young NAG:
Transport
Accommodation
Meals

 

Registration:

Make sure you sign up soon by responding to this email. Please provide your details:

First Name
Last Name
Company
Phone Number

Registration closes on May 11th, and the maximum capacity is 15 participants. The registration is first open for Ambassadors; however, if we still have free spots, we will reach out to broader Young NAG community. 

 

We are looking forward to seeing you at the Paris Air Show! If you have any questions, please send an email to young@nag.aero.
